meta.title: T-Construction LLC - Construction and Electrification Services in Armenia
meta.description: T-Construction LLC offers leading construction, electrification, and paving services in Armenia, ensuring quality, reliability, and safety.

footer.description: Inteco Energo CJSC is a leading construction company providing reliable and high-quality energy solutions.

serviceList.serviceExcerpt: Electric networks are vital for industry and communications.
The power supply system is reliable, safe, and long-lasting.
The company has extensive experience in cable works.

videoCta.title: One of Armenia's Largest Construction Companies
videoCta.text: Inteco Energo CJSC, founded in 2017, is one of Armenia's leading construction companies, carrying out diverse construction work in residential, public, and energy sectors, and is a key contractor for the Armenian Electrical Networks.

featureList.featureDescription: We strive to deliver high-quality in all our services.
Customer trust is our top priority.
We ensure top-level safety in all our projects and services.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.content: Inteco Energo CJSC was founded in March 2017 and is one of the largest construction companies in Armenia. We carry out diverse construction projects in residential, public, and energy sectors. Being a key contractor for the Armenian Electrical Networks, we have carried out large-scale construction, reconstruction, and modernization of energy infrastructure in Armenia and Artsakh.

list.content: We are committed to providing reliable and uninterrupted power supply to our clients.
Our projects contribute to increasing the stability of the energy system.
We reduce energy losses by using the most advanced technologies.

1.title: Construction, Reconstruction, and Repair of Transmission Substations
1.description: Electric networks and power supply are the basis for the industrial sector of telecommunications operators and service companies. Inteco Energo CJSC has earned a reputation in the market as a reliable partner and supplier of cutting-edge energy technologies through its systematic approach to the construction of high and low-voltage electrical networks, optical grounding wires, and transmission lines, as well as the supply and installation of transformer substations and alternative energy systems.

2.title: Electrification
2.description: The key characteristics of the power supply system are longevity, reliability, and safety. All electrical installation work is carried out according to high-quality standards, using cables and equipment from trusted and well-known manufacturers. The construction of substations and cable lines of 0.22 kV, 0.4 kV, 6 kV, 10 kV, 35 kV, and 110 kV is carried out.

3.title: Overhead and Underground Cable Works
3.description: Throughout its many years of operation, the company has gained extensive experience in performing overhead and underground cable works. The companyâ€™s main advantage lies in its highly qualified, certified, and experienced engineers and specialists. The company offers a full range of services, including the design of general networks, power transmission and distribution lines, obtaining all necessary permits, licenses, project and planning documentation, supply of cables and materials, and installation work.
